DOC.brief_summary: Pain is defined as a sensorial and emotional phenomenon and lead consequences on the cognition. These consequences could be increased with usual treatment. So the aim of this study is to explore these cognitive consequences.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Neuropathic Post-Zosterian Pain on the Cognition
DOC.detailed_description: Pilot prospective study with parallel groups
DOC.criteria: Patient suffering of NPZ pain Over 55 years old Healthy volunteers
